name: Toby's Island!
blurb: A 2D RPG adventure involving monster-raising, town-building, puzzles, classic turn based combat & exploration. Currently for PC

rewards.reward: -This is what we see ourselves charging for Toby's Island once it's done.  You get a digital download of Toby's Island and a special thanks in the games credits for you know... not pirating our game! :D
-Get a digital copy of Toby's Island when it's completed and a digital copy of it's soundtrack!\r\nOh, and a big old thanks in the credits!

-You get a digital copy of Toby's Island upon completion, a thank you in the credits! a digital copy of Toby's Island's sound track AND a super awesome secret xmas gift in december of 2014 from the Mvisioning Team!
The Two Pack! (nothing to do with 2 pac) Get everything from the $15 perk, but get an extra copy of all of it to give to a friend! Or horde it... you can do that too. (saving of $5)
-Get everything from the $15 perk, but get 2 extra copies of each item to give to 2 of your friends!  Or give both to one friend to make your other friends jealous. (saving of $10)
Get a digital copy of the game and the soundtrack, as well as a digital art book that doubles as a creature guide!
Comes with a digital copy of the game, the soundtrack, the creature guide, and an official digital strategy guide/walk through.  (Warning: strategy guide will contain many spoilers.)

The Legendary Edition!  This is a physical copy of the game, the soundtrack and the artbook.  (the price includes shipping).  Any perk over $100 that includes a 2 or 3 pack, comes with this physical copy for the buyer of the perk, instead of a digital copy (unless preferred otherwise.) The copies for your friends remain digital.  Please ask if you are unclear on what we mean.*

Create your very own NPC creature that will star in his own quest line (you write that too) which will appear randomly in game!  Work with us privately and even send in your own sketch! (Ask us about the terms and conditions if you are interested!)\r\n(includes all items from $25 two pack perk.)

design your own creature that can be unlocked in the game and receive a special edition physical copy of the game with your creature's art on the front cover! Get 2 digital copies of the game for your friends!

We will send you a list of all our creatures once they are planned out (you will be the very first to get to see this.) You can then pick 3 of them and have us make custom versions of them.  We will put those creatures in the game for you, unlockable by a code given only to you and 2 of your friends. ( the code will work in anyone's game, but only you 3 will know what it is.  the power is yours.) (This perk contains all items in the 3 pack $35 perk!)

Design your very own base level creature that can be owned by Toby.  You can also choose whether to help design it's evolution tree, or not!  Sometimes the fun is in the surprise! Talk us through what you want it to look like, or even send in a sketch! (This perk contains all items in the 3 pack $35 perk!)

Contains Limited special edition signed physical everything: copy of game, Walkthrough, creature guide, soundtrack and a Toby's Island Botanist Potion's Maker hardcover art book unique to this perk!) Only 5 will ever be made.

Get 5 physical limited edition copies of the game with soundtrack and artbook included Autographed by the illustrative artist of Toby's Island Matt Beer, and your choice at any one of our limited perks, (even if they are fully taken.)  You will also get your name in our credits as a Producer.

Get 10 physical limited edition copies of the game with soundtrack and artbook included Autographed by the illustrative artist of Toby's Island Matt Beer, and your choice at any two of our limited perks, (can even choose 2 of the same one, even if they are fully taken.)  You will also get your name in our credits as a Producer.
